title: Better Way to Live
titleEnglish: Better Way to Live (feat. Grian Chatten)

lines.english: Underneath all the thundering there's magic
lines.irish: Faoi bhun na toirneach uilig, tá draíocht ann

lines.english: And if there's a better way to live, I've gotta have it
lines.irish: Agus má tá bealach níos fearr le maireachtáil, caithfidh mé é a fháil

lines.english: Because I think all day, but when I drink I'm okay
lines.irish: Mar smaoiním an lá ar fad, ach bím ceart nuair a ólaim

lines.english: It gets further away, every time I try and grab it
lines.irish: Éiríonn sé níos faide uaim gach uair a dhéanfaidh mé iarracht greim a fháil air

lines.english: Underneath all the chattering there’s heaven
lines.irish: Faoi bhun na cainte go léir tá neamh ann

lines.english: I got a little peek one day, made me feel like I was 7
lines.irish: Fuair mé spléachadh beag lá amháin, bhraith mé amhail is go raibh mé seacht mbliana d’aois

lines.english: I know it exists, but I can't stop getting pissed
lines.irish: Tá a fhios agam go bhfuil sé ann, ach ní féidir liom éirí as a bheith ar meisce

lines.english: One more thing I'll be adding to the list
lines.irish: Rud eile eile le cur leis an liosta
Faoi dheireadh tá deireadh tagtha le mo rut
lines.english: Finally, my rut has come to an end

lines.irish: Mar bhí lá maith agamsa inniu buíochas le foc
lines.english: ‘Cause I had a good day today, thank f*ck
So I stroll I dtreo an pholl sa bhalla
lines.irish: Mar sin siúlaim i dtreo an pholl sa bhalla

lines.english: 4 digit code, what do you know its Mo Chara
lines.irish: Cód ceithre dhigit, cé eile ach Mo Chara

lines.english: And I'm gonna be spending my dole tonight
lines.irish: Agus táim chun mo dhólas a chaitheamh anocht

lines.english: Two pints at a time strolling about like Dolemite
lines.irish: Dhá phionta ag an am, siúl timpeall cosúil le Dolemite

lines.english: But home for a shite ar dtús, thit sé amach one push
lines.irish: Ach abhaile don chaca ar dtús, tháinig sé amach le brú amháin

lines.english: Mar nach raibh bac ar bith ag bailiú strap inniu, seo Móglaí Bap
lines.irish: ‘Cause no one bothered collecting strap today — it’s Móglaí Bap

lines.english: (what's happening)
lines.irish: (cad atá ag tarlú)

lines.english: And then we both jump down and do a class handstand
lines.irish: Ansin léimimid síos agus déanaimid handstand den scoth

lines.english: Like a man's man can
lines.irish: Mar atá fíorfhear in ann
Fág slán leis an dúshlán a bhí againn an mhí seo
lines.english: Say goodbye to the hardship we had this month
Mar go dtí seo, I'm on the upside of the sea-saw
lines.irish: ‘Cause up to now, tá mé ar an taobh thuas den trasnán

lines.english: Underneath all the thundering there's magic
lines.irish: Faoi bhun na toirneach uilig, tá draíocht ann

lines.english: And if there's a better way to live, I've gotta have it
lines.irish: Agus má tá bealach níos fearr le maireachtáil, caithfidh mé é a fháil

lines.english: I know it exists, but I can't stop getting pissed
lines.irish: Tá a fhios agam go bhfuil sé ann, ach ní féidir liom éirí as a bheith ar meisce

lines.english: One more thing I'll be adding to the list
lines.irish: Rud eile eile le cur leis an liosta
Go fóill ag mothú cosúil le cac
lines.english: Still feeling like shite

lines.irish: Ach ní ligim orm féin cause an ndéanann sé stop?
lines.english: But I don’t let on — does it make it stop?
Obviously not, what? Is mise Moglai Bap
lines.irish: Ar ndóigh nach ea. Mise Móglaí Bap

lines.english: Cuirim mo raybans orm sula bhfágaim an teach
lines.irish: I put my Ray-Bans on before I leave the house

lines.english: Nó ba chuma liom, cause tá an t-am ag dul anonn
lines.irish: Or maybe I don’t care, time’s slipping by
Is tá an saol seo I bhfad róghairid bheith ag cur amú an oiread ama ann
lines.english: Life’s far too short to waste this much time

lines.irish: Go síoraí i do cheann ag iarraidh éalú achan soicind
lines.english: Constantly in your head, trying to escape every second
Irish exit out the back without text
lines.irish: Imeacht ciúin amach an doras cúil gan teachtaireacht
Mar caithfidh tú tú féin a chur chun tosaigh
lines.english: You have to put yourself first

lines.irish: I bhfad rófhurast bheith chomh crua ort féin i gcónaí
lines.english: Way too easy to be hard on yourself all the time

lines.irish: Mar ní haon áit bheith i’do chónaí, déan cibé rud dtig leat a stócaigh
lines.english: ‘Cause that’s no place to live — do what you can, lad

lines.irish: Is faigh fíor-bhlas sula n-imíonn an beocht di
lines.english: And get a real taste before the spark fades
Underneath all the thundering there's magic
lines.irish: Faoi bhun na toirneach uilig, tá draíocht ann

Imigh as do cheann
lines.english: Get out of your head

lines.irish: Caith do chloigeann in airde
lines.english: Throw your head up

lines.irish: Ar barr na [donn?], thuigimse go bhfuil an saol trom
lines.english: On top of the ...? (unclear), I get that life is heavy

lines.irish: Is tionchar ann, but we got one chance at, then it's done
lines.english: There’s pressure, but we get one chance — then it’s done
So bí thú fhéin, speak your pain, and receive the love
lines.irish: Mar sin bí tú féin, labhair do phian, agus glac leis an ngrá

lines.english: Don't let the cunts get ya
lines.irish: Ná lig do na h-amadáin tú a tharraingt síos

lines.english: Down, surround yourself with ones that miss ya
lines.irish: Timpeall tú féin le daoine a airíonn uait

lines.english: Tóg soicind, tóg anall, nach go [mí sciste?]
lines.irish: Take a second, breathe deep, isn’t it ...? (unclear)

lines.english: Is creid go daingean go bhfuil an saol seo duitse
lines.irish: And believe firmly this life is for you
